require(readtext)

```{r readfile,include=FALSE}
mydf<-read.xlsx('allrevs_14Aug.xlsx', sheetName = "Reviews")
allcodes<-unique(mydf$ID)
w<-which(is.na(allcodes))
allcodes<-allcodes[-w]

allfiles<-list.files("exported_reports")
thisnum<-length(allfiles)+1


w<-which(mydf$ID==allcodes[thisnum])
thisbit <- mydf[w,4:5]
myft <- flextable(thisbit)
border <- fp_border_default()
myft <- vline(myft, j = c('code1'), border = border, part = "all")
myft<- hline(myft)
myft <- set_table_properties(myft,layout="autofit")
myft

```
